howToInstall.title: Grabs Getting started
howToInstall.subtitle: Grabs is a development environment offering a combination of many features that are needed which simplify adding new features, start your project immediately and providing fast development with popular libraries.
howToInstall.description: In order to use Grabs, Node.js, Npm and Grunt must be installed. By applying the steps down below your development environment will be ready to use.

items.name: GRUNT
items.text: Add every task with Grunt plugins. Configure every Grunt options with single config file.(gruntfile.js)

items.name: ANGULAR
items.text: Use of AngularJS. Use of HTML5 Push State is available and every request is handled at index.html. Configure every Grunt options with single config file.(app/js/config/ng-config.js)

items.name: BOWER
items.text: Download 3rd party libraries. Configure Bower options at bower.json and use grunt bower:install command to download libraries.

items.name: STYLUS
items.text: Compile and compress Stylus files. Use of LESS or SASS is available.

items.name: SPRITE
items.text:
Combine images under app/img/sprite directory to sprite.png file as sprite and provides automatic use of image file inside Stylus files without defining positions.

Combine images under app/img/sprite-retina directory to sprite-retina.png file as sprite and use retina sprite for devices with retine support automatically. Other files are automacitally moved to build directory.

ex: app/css/global.styl

items.name: TEMPLATE
items.text: Use HTML templates features.

items.name: DEVELOPMENT MODE
items.text: Uncompressed HTML, CSS, JS and IMAGE files.

items.name: LIVE MODE
items.text: Compressed HTML, CSS, JS and IMAGE files.

items.name: JSHINT
items.text: Validate JavaScript file with JSHint.

items.name: CODE COMPLEXITY REPORT
items.text: Generate code complexity report for JavaScript files. Use grunt report command.

items.name: COMPRESS HTML
items.text: Compress HTML files.

items.name: COMPRESS IMAGE
items.text: Compress IMAGE files.

items.name: COMPRESS JAVASCRIPT
items.text: Compress JavaScript files. Support for source map.

items.name: NOTIFICATION
items.text: Notify for JavaScript errors and other console errors based on OS. Define notifications for any task.

items.name: CACHE
items.text: Cache compressed HTML, CSS, JavaScript and IMAGE files. (ex: app.min.1408295277445.css)

items.name: SERVER
items.text: Built-in server included.

items.name: LIVERELOAD
items.text: Refresh HTML, CSS, JS, and JSON files automatically.

items.name: MULTILANGUAGE SUPPORT
items.text: Add multiple languages to your project. (ex: homepage)
